actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the reimbursement of regulated public utilities engaged in the sale of electric power at the wholesale or retail level for any amount expended for residual fuel oil which is more than average price for residual fuel oil during calendar year 1972, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the reimbursement of regulated public utilities engaged in the sale of electric power at the wholesale or retail level for any amount expended for residual fuel oil which is more than the average price for residual fuel oil during calendar year 1972.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the reimbursement of regulated public utilities engaged in the sale of electric power at the wholesale or retail level for any amount expended for residual fuel oil which is more than average price for residual fuel oil during calendar year 1972, and for other purposes.
